Articles.Content:
A modest home on Minmus:

With a Kethane refinery and a shuttle parked out back.

This was part of my mission to learn Kethane, and set up a refuelling station above Minmus. This project was hugely successful. So much so, that I decided to turn Minmus into a permanent outpost. We built them a house, but the Kerbals turned it into a home.
